title: Definitions of free energy
body:
In the literature, two different definitions of the free energy are common:
thermodynamic / probabilistic free energy geometric free energy The question is how to interprete the delta function in the following definition [1]
F(s) = - \beta^{-1} \ln \int_{R^n} \exp(-\beta V(x)) \delta(s) What are their differences/similarities?
Footnotes https://doi.org/10.1140/epjst/e2011-01519-7 ↩︎
